# denyMultiplayerGaming

**Type Property**

The metadata associated with the setting that prevents users from joining multiplayer games.

## Declaration

```swift
static let denyMultiplayerGaming: SettingMetadata<Bool>
```

## Discussion

Use `denyMultiplayerGaming` to access the metadata for [doc://com.apple.ManagedSettings/documentation/ManagedSettings/GameCenterSettings/denyMultiplayerGaming-swift.property]. The default value is `false`.

## Denying the Ability to Join Multiplayer Games

- **denyMultiplayerGaming**: A Boolean value that indicates whether your app prevents the user joining multiplayer games.
